## Installation of the required GIS tools

If you do not have installed any of the GIS tools, please, install before using `hydrographr`.

**GRASS GIS**

If you use Ubuntu you can copy-paste the commands below. If you use another Linux distribution, please, see the [GRASS GIS](https://grass.osgeo.org/download/linux/) webpage for installation instruction.

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
# Install and update GRASS GIS
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntugis/ubuntugis-unstable
sudo apt update
sudo apt-get install ubuntugis-unstable
```

**GDAL/ORG**

For GDAL, go to the GDAL webpage and [download](https://gdal.org/download.html#current-release) the last release for your Linux distribution (e.g. gdal-3.5.2.tar.gz).

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
# Go to the Downloads folder
cd /Downloads

# Install gdal
# Note: Change program name according to the release and Linux distribution you have downloaded.
tar -zxvf gdal-3.5.2.tar.gz 

# Install pktools
sudo bash install_pktools.sh
```

**pktools**

To install pktools, please visit the [pktools webpage](https://pktools.nongnu.org/html/md_installation_linux.html#install_manual) and follow the guidelines according to your Linux distribution.
